name.baseName: 电容器、辅助设备和能源使用

dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Capacitive component; Energy storage device; Electronic component; Reactance part; Capacitor bank; Passive electrical device; Condenser; Filter capacitor; Electrolytic capacitor; Ceramic capacitor; Film capacitor; Tantalum capacitor; Supercapacitor; Variable capacitor; Fixed capacitor

Capacitive component; Energy storage device; Electronic component; Reactance part; Capacitor bank; Passive electrical device; Condenser; Filter capacitor; Electrolytic capacitor; Ceramic capacitor; Film capacitor; Tantalum capacitor; Supercapacitor; Variable capacitor; Fixed capacitor
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: This product flow pertains to a capacitor and includes the use of auxiliaries and energy during its lifecycle. It encompasses the level of processing the capacitor has undergone, compliance with industry standards, its quality attributes and how it is used. The production route taken to manufacture the capacitor and the name of any starting materials (educts) are also detailed. It is further clarified whether the capacitor represents a product blend as part of a production or consumption mix. The description includes the location where the capacitor is available, signifying if it is provided to the consumer or if it is accessible at the manufacturing plant.
该产品流程涉及到电容器以及在其生命周期中使用的辅助材料和能源。它包括电容器经历的加工水平，行业标准的符合性，其质量属性以及使用情况。还详细说明了制造电容器的生产路线和任何起始材料（原料）的名称。它进一步明确了电容器是否代表生产或消费混合物中的产品混合物。描述包括电容器的可用位置，表明它是提供给消费者的，还是在制造厂可获得。
